job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly translates to 'you maintain the application', which is a core software development task.
This translates to 'set up the LTB processes'. While 'LTB' is not defined, setting up processes for an application falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: je richt de onboarding volgens de Cloud standaarden van a.s.r. in
job_tasks.justification: This means 'you set up the onboarding according to the Cloud standards of a.s.r.'. Setting up cloud-based processes and onboarding aligns with software integration and operational aspects of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: de applicatie onderhoud je door bugs te fixen en het verbeteren van de code, alerting en monitoring in Application Insights
job_tasks.justification: This phrase details 'you maintain the application by fixing bugs and improving the code, alerting, and monitoring in Application Insights'. Bug fixing, code improvement, and setting up monitoring are all fundamental software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: je zorgt ervoor dat nieuwe gebruikers binnen a.s.r. worden aangesloten
job_tasks.justification: This translates to 'you ensure that new users within a.s.r. are connected'. Connecting users to an application is part of the integration and operational side of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwt interfaces voor nieuwe bronnen en consumerende systemen
job_tasks.justification: This means 'builds interfaces for new sources and consuming systems'. Building interfaces for integration is a direct software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: je ontwikkelt interfaces voor het aansluiten op het DataWareHouse en nieuwe features
job_tasks.justification: This translates to 'you develop interfaces for connecting to the Data Warehouse and new features'. Developing interfaces for data integration and new features is a core software development activity.

soft_skills.phrase: Als we denken dat er een match mogelijk is, nodigen we je uit voor een eerste gesprek. Dit is meestal met de manager van de afdeling waar de vacature is.
soft_skills.justification: The description of the interview process implies communication and interaction with hiring managers and potentially other team members.

soft_skills.phrase: Als we na dit gesprek allebei verder willen praten, dan plannen we een vervolggesprek.
soft_skills.justification: The mention of follow-up conversations indicates a need for ongoing communication and collaboration during the hiring process.

soft_skills.phrase: Als we na de gesprekken en een positief assessment allebei enthousiast zijn, doen we je een aanbod om bij ons te komen werken.
soft_skills.justification: The final stage of the hiring process, involving mutual enthusiasm and an offer, highlights the importance of communication and alignment.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks such as application maintenance, bug fixing, code improvement, setting up processes, building interfaces, and integrating with data sources. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its responsibilities, which are all within the scope of traditional software engineering. There are no ambiguous terms or mentions of AI/ML that would suggest a different profile. The tasks described are concrete and directly map to the 'Software Development & Integration' category.
